
Aim : To process and classify the newsgroup document data. The subjects sci.space and rec.autos were selected for analysis. East task, along with the solutions are presented below.


Dataset Source:
www.csail.mit.edu/~jrennie/20Newsgroups/

Files:

- knn_text_classification.R - contains the R code for classification process
- freqwordcloud.png displays the word cloud obtained from the frequent words
- Effectiveness_of_KNN_experiments.R - an extension to this project that measures and compares the accuracy, precision, recall and F-score of various text pre-processing experiments
